info.author: Tres Seaver, Agendaless Consulting
info.description:
``pyramid_who``
===============

``pyramid_who`` is an extension for the ``pyramid`` web framework, providing
an authentication policy based on the "new" ``repoze.who`` API, as found in
version 2.0 and greater.

For more information see http://docs.pylonsproject.org/projects/pyramid_who/dev/


``pyramid_who`` Changelog
=========================

0.3 (2011-11-07)
----------------

- Add tox.ini for Jenkins testing.

- Added a "challenge decider" function for use by ``repoze.who`` with
  current versions of ``pyramid``, which now return "403 Forbidden" instead
  of "401 Unauthorized" on authorization failures.


0.2 (2011-03-23)
----------------

- Pass the identifier plugin to ``api.remember``, rather than its name,
  as required by the interface.  Fixes
  https://github.com/Pylons/pyramid_who/issues#issue/2

- Fixed test of ``unauthenticated_userid``.

- Fixed tests broken by ``repoze.who`` changes (relaxing exceptions to
  warnings for missing / invalid config rile).

- Fixed URL to docs in README.txt.  Thanks to Łukasz Fidosz.


0.1 (2011-02-18)
----------------

- Add ``unauthenticated_userid`` method to whov2 authentication policy to
  appease Pyramid 1.0 IAuthenticationPolicy interface.

- Add a tox.ini file for Jenkins testing.


0.0 (2011-01-10)
----------------

- Initial public version.
info.keywords: web wsgi pyramid pylons repoze who authentication
info.name: pyramid_who
info.summary: Pyramid authentication policies based on repoze.who

pyramid_who

pyramid_who is an extension for the pyramid web framework, providing an authentication policy based on the “new” repoze.who API, as found in version 2.0 and greater.

For more information see http://docs.pylonsproject.org/projects/pyramid_who/dev/

pyramid_who Changelog

0.3 (2011-11-07)

  • Add tox.ini for Jenkins testing.
  • Added a “challenge decider” function for use by repoze.who with current versions of pyramid, which now return “403 Forbidden” instead of “401 Unauthorized” on authorization failures.

0.2 (2011-03-23)

  • Pass the identifier plugin to api.remember, rather than its name, as required by the interface. Fixes https://github.com/Pylons/pyramid_who/issues#issue/2
  • Fixed test of unauthenticated_userid.
  • Fixed tests broken by repoze.who changes (relaxing exceptions to warnings for missing / invalid config rile).
  • Fixed URL to docs in README.txt. Thanks to Łukasz Fidosz.

0.1 (2011-02-18)

  • Add unauthenticated_userid method to whov2 authentication policy to appease Pyramid 1.0 IAuthenticationPolicy interface.

0.0 (2011-01-10)

  • Initial public version.
